title: Building websites using R + GitHub
text:
Read-along tutorial
The tutorial shows how to deploy a website, hosted on GitHub Pages for free, using R and Markdown.
Link to tutorial
To make the process easy, I have created a dummy website that provides a template for building a professional website with two pages: a homepage and a webpage for describing your research experience. The template can be customized by renaming and repurposing the individual pages.


Video tutorial

Source: Workshop hosted on Zoom by Billu in September, 2024.

title: IUSSI-NAS DEIJ Committee
text:
IUSSI-NAS website
  
  
    
     Email DEIJ committee
  

  
  

Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Justice committee for the IUSSI North American section.


﻿The IUSSI-NAS believes that everyone, regardless of identity (including race, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic class, ethnicity, religion, caste, age, nationality, and ability status), belongs in social insect science. Like the diversity found in a social insect society, having a diverse membership leads to better overall outcomes, and ultimately advances scientific knowledge. IUSSI-NAS is working to support diversity, accessibility, and inclusion efforts by creating opportunities for participation and advancement in social insect science as a whole and actively opposing racism and all other forms of discrimination and harassment. We will listen, learn from, and work with our members from all career stages and backgrounds to build a more diverse, equitable, inclusive, and just community of social insect researchers. You can reach out to the Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Justice (DEIJ) Committee anytime with thoughts and concerns.
Email: iussi.nas.deij@gmail.com.

title: Professional Workshop Series
text:
Past and Upcoming workshops






Navigating the workshops





Most latest workshops are shown at the top by default.
Users can use the following to narrow their search for a workshop.

Categories: Search for keywords to find similar workshops
Filter: Filter the workshops by matching words in their titles or date

title: IUSSI-NAS DEIJ
text:
The IUSSI-NAS DEIJ Outreach Program was started to serve as an umbrella program for DEIJ-related initiatives and outreach, not only across IUSSI-NAS, but to reach non-members as well.
For the initial phase of the program, we have identified three primary branches that we are currently working on:

Turner-Collins Recognition Program
Professional Development Workshop Series, and
Fundraising to create a DEIJ Outreach Fund that can provide monetary support
for current and future DEIJ initiatives of IUSSI-NAS members.

title: [UPCOMING] Workshop title here.
text:
This sentence will be displayed as a brief description of the workshop.
Share workshop materials here. Two options:

Provide necessary links to the materials
Work with someone to write a tutorial / provide materials directly here.
